abstract: Saudi Arabia denies reports that its attack helicopters killed 30 civilians in Yemeni village of Bani Zela in Hajjah Province; Saba news agency, which is controlled by Houthi group that is in charge of much of country, says 28 civilians died in attacks and 17 others were injured.
lead_paragraph: Attack helicopters flying from Saudi Arabia killed 30 civilians in Yemen, according to accounts by residents and local medical officials.

headline.main: Saudi Officials Deny Killing Civilians in Yemen
headline.print_headline: Saudi Officials Deny Killing Yemeni Civilians

snippet: Attack helicopters flying from Saudi Arabia killed 30 civilians in Yemen, according to accounts by residents and local medical officials.
